recipesJson.name: Burley Scotch
recipesJson.author: besejuiced
recipesJson.description:
Craving for a tobacco vape enriched with butterscotch?
A perfectly blended mix of premium tobacco aromas and rich butterscotch, Perfect for an after dinner vape.

Steep: need 10 days to get settled

Make a POD juice? add 12% or more in a 50/50 or 60/40 base solution

reviews.text: I won’t get too into detail. I’m too busy enjoying this masterpiece. Stuff is amazing. If you like butterscotch, vanilla, or any type of tobacco that’s supposed to taste good, you’ll be happy that you finally found a recipe like this one

This is a really nice tobacco forward recipe! You can't go wrong with Red Burley. That chocolate note is amazing. I was afraid that it would clash with the Butterscotch here but it doesn't. It layers with it nicely. The Cured keeps this a bold tobacco with its cigar like quality and slight ashiness. When I vape this I get a face full of that chocolate note layering with the subtle Butterscotch and all that tobacco goodness backing it all up underneath. Very nicely balanced mix! If you love tobaccos this is a winner.
